com.twitter.heron.scheduler.mesos.framework

Class LaunchableTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.scheduler.mesos.framework.LaunchableTask

  • public class LaunchableTask
extends java.lang.Object
    A structure to group container info and mesos info, representing a task ready to launch
